actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Appropriations.
Reported to House from the Committee on Appropriations, H. Rept. 94-752.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: Resolution disapproving the deferral of certain budget authority (D76-83) relating to the Environmental Protection Agency, which is proposed by the President in his message of November 29,1975, transmitted under section 1013 of the Impoundment Control Act of 1974.

summary.text: Disapproves the deferral of $15,000,000 in budget authority (D76-83) relating to the Environmental Protection Agency, Abatement and Control, which is proposed by the President in his message of November 29, 1975, transmitted under the Impoundment Control Act of 1974.

titles.title: Resolution disapproving the deferral of certain budget authority (D76-83) relating to the Environmental Protection Agency, which is proposed by the President in his message of November 29,1975, transmitted under section 1013 of the Impoundment Control Act of 1974.
